thread.title: Barrick Gold to sell 50 pct stake in Chile mine to Antofagasta
thread.title_full: Barrick Gold to sell 50 pct stake in Chile mine to Antofagasta

title: Barrick Gold to sell 50 pct stake in Chile mine to Antofagasta
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Jul 30, 2015, 21:40 BST - UK Markets closed Barrick Gold to sell 50 pct stake in Chile mine to Antofagasta Reuters - UK Focus – 9 minutes ago 581.00 -4.00 
July 30 (Reuters) - Barrick Gold Corp said on Thursday it has reached an agreement to sell 50 percent of its Zaldivar copper mine in Chile to Chile-focused miner Antofagasta (LSE: ANTO.L - news ) Plc for just over $1 billion in cash. 
"Following a highly competitive auction process, we are pleased to reach an agreement with the ideal partner for Zaldívar," Barrick Co-President Kelvin Dushnisky said in a statement. (Reporting by Nicole Mordant in Vancouver; Editing by Lisa Shumaker) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
